question: I want to do a job to support my parents. I have no brothers, and when my parents grow old, there wont be anyone to support them. So am i doing wrong?
answer:
QUESTION
Thanku brother..Jazakallah. After marriage, my husband wont support my parents b'cuz he'll be busy supporting his parents.
ANSWER


Share:
The place of woman is at home and take care of her children and offsprings
as Allah Ta'ala states, 'Stay in your houses and do not display yourselves
like that of the times of ignorance .' (Ahzaab Verse 33)

But if a woman needs to work, she must conform to the Shari'ah rules of
Hijaab.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
